data.title: Lady gaga
data.meta_description: Lady gaga - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. LADY GAGA BY H O L LY C O N N E L L

2. INTRODUCTION • Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta was born March 28, 1986. Her most recognisable name is ‘Lady Gaga’, she is an American singer, songwriter and actress. • In addition she is popular modern recording artist, she is known for experimenting with new musical ideas and images and for her unconventionality and provocative work.

3. EARLY LIFE • Stefani was born at the Lenox Hill Hospital on Manhattans Upper East Side to a Catholic family. • Her parents are Cynthia Louise and Joseph Germanotta and has a younger sister named Natali. They were a from a lower-class family and worked hard for everything. She considered herself a misfit among her peers and was mocked for "being either too provocative or too eccentric”. • Gaga began to play the piano at the age of four when her mother insisted she become "a cultured young woman", taking lessons and practicing the instrument throughout her childhood. The lessons taught her to create music by ear, which she preferred over reading sheet music and practiced professionally. The singer's parents encouraged

4. CAREER BEGINNING • In 2005, Gaga recorded two songs with hip-hop singer In 2005, Gaga recorded two songs with hip-hop singer Grandmaster Melle Mel for an audio book accompanying Cricket Casey’s children’s book The Portal in the Park. In addition she formed a band called the Stefani Germanotta Band with friends, they would often play gigs around New York. • In 2005, Lady Gaga was briefly signed by Def Jam Records, but was dropped just months later. Being dropped by the label propelled the singer to perform on her own in clubs and venues on New York City's Lower East Side. There, she collaborated with several rock bands, and began her experimentation with fashion. • In 2007, at the age of 20, Gaga began work at Interscope Records as a songwriter for other artists on the label, including Britney Spears and The Pussycat Dolls. R&B singer Akon discovered Gaga while performing a burlesque show that she created, called ‘Lady Gaga and the Starlight Revenue.’ Akon signed the performer to his label. • In 2007, she recorded her debut album, The Fame, it received positive reviews and was successful in the US.

5. THE FAME • The Fame is the debut studio album by Lady Gaga, and is the most popular album she has ever released. • It was available on August 19, 2008 through Interscope Records • The Fame is a synth-pop and dance-pop album that has influences of pop music from the 1980s. • The Fame became the fifth best-selling album of 2009. It has sold 4.7 million copies in the United States as of April 2016 and is the seventh best-selling digital album in history. The album had sold 15 million copies worldwide as of November 2010.

6. STUDIO ALBUMS • The Fame - 2008 • Born this way - 2011 • Artpop - 2013 • Cheek to Cheek - 2014 • Joanne - 2016

7. TRANSFORMATION
